_source.text: 22-year-old Jack Tatum wasn't even born when '80s indie pop was at its peak, but the kid who performs as Wild Nothing knows the sound better than anyone in music today.

text: 22-year-old **Jack** Tatum wasn't even born when '80s indie pop was at its peak, but the **kid** who
performs as Wild Nothing knows the sound **better** **than** anyone in music today.
